item.title: Roblox: Break Brainrot Bones Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
The name Break Brainrot Bones is very intriguing, and this Roblox game will live up to your expectations. First, you will select a brainrot to transform into, and then simply fall onto the obstacle course in the hope that your brainrot will sustain as many injuries as possible. Along the way, you will encounter numerous trampolines, spikes, and other objects that can hurt you. At the end, you will receive money for literally every hit, so it is not only interesting but also profitable to watch.

Then all you have to do is buy pets and upgrade coin multipliers to earn even more. In addition, you can redeem Break Brainrot Bones codes and get extra currency to speed up your progress even more.

All Break Brainrot Bones Codes

Working Break Brainrot Bones Codes

  • UPD1 - Redeem this code to get x1 Luck Potion and x1 Wins Potion.
  • BRAINROT - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins.
  • LIKES - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins.

Expired Break Brainrot Bones Codes

Currently, there are no expired codes for Break Brainrot Bones . All codes are working, and you can get rewards for them.

To be successful in Break Brainrot Bones , you will need to send your character down the slope hundreds of times. All this is to earn as many coins as possible to buy new brainrots and pets. However, beginners start with no money at all, so to make it easier for them, the developers have added the ability to redeem codes. This way, you can get not only coins but also potions absolutely free.

How to Redeem Codes in Break Brainrot Bones

To redeem Roblox codes, you first need to find them, so we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Break Brainrot Bones .

  • Launch Roblox and open Break Brainrot Bones .
  • Look at the left side of the screen. Click on the red shopping cart button to go to the Shop.
  • Then click on the text box on the left side of the window to go to the Codes tab.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the field and click on the green Verify button.

Remember that codes for this Roblox game must be active to receive rewards, so redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Break Brainrot Bones Codes

You can find all working Roblox codes in this guide. You can also find them on the developers' pages at the links below.

  • Break Brainrot Bones Roblox game page
  • Break Brainrot Bones Roblox group

item.title: Roblox: Grow a Unit TD Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Grow a Unit TD is a Roblox game where you will be not only a brave defender, but also a gardener. Usually, in tower defense games, you need to defend your base and buy units with the money you earn. However, here you first need to plant seeds and wait for the unit to sprout. Only then can you add it to your inventory and use it on the battlefield. Seeds, especially high-quality ones, are expensive, so we recommend purchasing Grow a Unit TD codes to get free rewards.

All Grow a Unit TD Codes

Working Grow a Unit TD Codes

  • COOKING_EVENT - Redeem this code to get a Culinarian Chest.
  • GIANT_TREE_SECRETS - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • NOT_A_SECRET_CODE - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • SMALL_UPDATE - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • 2K_LIKES_BEAN - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • COCOMANGO_COMPENSATION - Redeem this code to get Cocomango.
  • KITCHEN_DISASTER - Redeem this code to get a Food Crate.
  • RAID_GAMEMODE - Redeem this code to get a Mecha Seed Pack.
  • ZEN_EVENT - Redeem this code to get a KitsuneCrate.
  • INSECTS_INVASION - Redeem this code to get a Zen Crate.
  • 750LIKES_PACK - Redeem this code to get an Ancient Seed Pack.
  • 600_LIKES_PRIZE - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • DUNGEON_BUG - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • PEPPER_NERF - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • DUNGEON - Redeem this code to get 250 Bones.
  • BIZZY_BEES - Redeem this code to get a Honey Seed Pack .
  • 500LIKES_UNIT - Redeem this code to get a Mango Unit.
  • GAUTD - Redeem this code to get 100 Sheckles.
  • BZZZ_BZZZZ - Redeem this code to get free rewards.

Expired Grow a Unit TD Codes

  • 500K_VISITS
  • WEATHERS
  • 100LIKES_UNIT
  • GEMS_FOR_TRADE
  • ENDLESSMODE
  • GAUTD
  • ENDLESS
  • RELEASE

How to Redeem Codes in Grow a Unit TD

In Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes, but in Grow a Unit TD , you must first fulfill certain conditions. You need to get 10 wins, and only then will you be able to receive rewards. Below, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Grow a Unit TD .

  • Launch Roblox and open Grow a Unit TD .
  • Look at the left side of the screen. Click on the red shopping cart button.
  • Scroll down to the bottom of the window. You will see the Codes section.
  • Paste the code from our list of working codes and click on the green Redeem button.

Remember that the codes must be redeemed before they expire, so hurry up to get your rewards.

How to Get More Grow a Unit TD Codes

In our guides, you will find all the latest Roblox codes, so you can bookmark this page in your browser so you don't lose it. You can also find codes on the developers' websites.

  • Grow a Unit TD Roblox game page
  • Grow a Unit TD Roblox group
  • Grow a Unit TD Discord server

item.title: Genshin Impact Leak Teases Durin's Gameplay
item.description:
A recent leak from Genshin Impact is teasing the gameplay for upcoming playable character Durin, currently expected to release during the Version 6.2 update. The launch of Nod-Krai has brought a wide cast of new characters to the HoYoverse RPG, both featuring immediately playable characters and several more teased for the future. Lauma, Aino, and Flins served as the trio of characters joining Genshin Impact with Nod-Krai's launch, with HoYoverse already confirming Nefer for the Version 6.1 update. Now, another future character is being teased through leaks.

Durin has served as one of Genshin Impact 's longest-rumored characters, with implications in the in-game lore dating back to the RPG's early days. Durin was first teased in-game during the release of Dragonspine in Version 1.2 with the fearsome dragon said to have died south of Mondstadt, becoming the mountain featured in the game. A new version of Durin was later created within the Simulanka by Hexenzirkel member Andersdotter during Version 4.8's Summertide Scales and Tales event, confirmed to feature a human form in Nod-Krai. Leaks are now giving an idea of how Durin will play in Genshin Impact .

A recent leak shared via leakers Kokomi, HomDGCat, and Seele is hinting at the gameplay for Durin's release in Version 6.2. According to the post, Durin will act similarly to a Pyro version of Escoffier, with off-field Pyro application and RES shred as a major part of his kit. Durin will also provide special buffs when other Hexenzirkel members are in the team, reducing enemies' RES when hit with Pyro Elemental Reactions while paired with other Hexenzirkel characters. The post even includes some pre-existing characters who count towards the requirement, including Albedo, Mona, Venti, and Klee.

Genshin Impact Leak Teases Durin's Gameplay

Durin's abilities becoming more powerful when paired with Hexenzirkel members likely provides a strong hint at some of the game's next releases. HoYoverse confirmed multiple Hexenzirkel members will become playable throughout the course of the Nod-Krai cycle, teasing new characters like Alice and Nicole Reeyn. The Hexenzirkel was also directly named in Genshin Impact 's teasers for Nod-Krai, with the mysterious organization said to be one of the major factions involved in the region's story. Durin and Version 6.2 are expected to launch on December 3.

Genshin Impact 's Nod-Krai looks to have lots in store for fans of the game with a plethora of exciting characters coming soon. A pair of Fatui Harbingers have already appeared in Nod-Krai's story, with both Columbina and Sandrone involved in the Archon Quest and expected to become playable. The previously-mentioned Alice is also expected to finally make her in-game debut, after being mentioned within the game as early as Version 1.0. Genshin Impact 's roster should have some of its most notable additions yet during the Nod-Krai cycle.

item.title: Roblox: Japanese Supermarket Simulator Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Japanese Supermarket Simulator is a cool Roblox game to spend a couple of evenings. Unlike similar games, it has an improved interface and a bunch of trading options. Obviously, you will be selling goods from Japan, including coffee, semi-finished products, and even magazines.

Since you will be doing all the work related to the store, you will have to calculate the purchases and order goods. Some of them won't fit on regular shelves, so you'll also need to order refrigerators or freezers. It's also worth buying some nice decorations and, of course, sales licenses. All of this requires a lot of money, so it's better to buy a couple of Japanese Supermarket Simulator codes to speed up your progress.

All Japanese Supermarket Simulator Codes

Working Japanese Supermarket Simulator Codes

  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins.
  • MINTYBONUS - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins.

Expired Japanese Supermarket Simulator Codes

Currently, there are no expired codes for Japanese Supermarket Simulator . All codes are working, and you can redeem them.

Running any business is very difficult and costly, especially if it is a Japanese grocery store. You will need to do more than just open a store and serve customers. Your responsibilities also include displaying and ordering goods, dealing with bureaucratic issues, and decorating the premises. It will be especially difficult for beginners, because even to earn your first thousand coins, you will have to work hard. So the developers have added the ability to redeem codes and get your first money for a more pleasant start.

How to Redeem Codes in Japanese Supermarket Simulator

Usually, in Roblox games such as Japanese Supermarket Simulator , redeeming codes is very easy. However, not all players immediately understand the interface, so we have created a guide to help them with redeeming codes in Japanese Supermarket Simulator .

  • Launch Roblox and open Japanese Supermarket Simulator .
  • Press K on your keyboard or tap the button with the text label next to the settings in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the white text field and press the green Redeem button.

Remember that you need to redeem the code before it expires to get the rewards.

How to Get More Japanese Supermarket Simulator Codes

We regularly create guides with new promo codes and update them so that you receive the latest information. You can bookmark this page in your browser by pressing Ctrl + D so you don't lose it. You can also visit the game developers' pages.

  • Japanese Supermarket Simulator Roblox game page
  • Japanese Supermarket Simulator Roblox group
  • Japanese Supermarket Simulator Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Plane Race with 99 Propellers Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Plane Race with 99 Propellers is a wonderful Roblox game that combines popular mechanics and nice gameplay. Your main goal is to improve your plane to fly as far as possible. If you are an experienced player, you will immediately realize that you need to buy eggs from pets and reincarnate to become faster and more resilient.

In addition, you can change the plane itself, buy new propellers for it, and even upgrade them. You can even buy an aura farmer for your plane to make it not only faster but also more powerful. Of course, this requires a lot of grinding, but fortunately, you can redeem Plane Race with 99 Propellers codes and speed up your progress a little.

All Plane Race with 99 Propellers Codes

Working Plane Race with 99 Propellers Codes

  • welcome - Redeem this code to get 1 2x Wins Potion.
  • lava - Redeem this code to get 1 2x Wins Potion.

Expired Plane Race with 99 Propellers Codes

There are currently no expired codes for Plane Race with 99 Propellers . All codes are working, and you can redeem them.

In Plane Race with 99 Propellers , you will spend more time upgrading and training than actually flying. This is not surprising, as the basis of the gameplay here is building a cool plane, and flying is more of a formality, because you just fly forward without the ability to influence anything.

Accordingly, you need new pets, propellers, aura farmers, and the possibilities are simply dazzling. If you are a beginner, you will have to grind for a long time to get all this. Even if you have spent a lot of time playing the game, upgrades will still not come easily. So it's better to buy a couple of Plane Race with 99 Propellers codes. This will give you a couple of useful items that will speed up your progress.

How to Redeem Codes in Plane Race with 99 Propellers

In Roblox games, developers often add the ability to enter codes and receive rewards. In Plane Race with 99 Propellers , this is very easy to do, but just in case, we have created a guide on how to redeem codes.

  • Launch Roblox and open Plane Race with 99 Propellers .
  • Look at the upper right corner of the screen. Click the button with the text label next to the settings.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click the green Verify button.

Remember that codes can expire over time, so you need to redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Plane Race with 99 Propellers Codes

Our guides always contain the latest Roblox codes, as we update them regularly. However, you can also find codes on the developers' pages.

  • Plane Race with 99 Propellers Roblox game page
  • Plane Race with 99 Propellers Roblox group
  • Plane Race with 99 Propellers Discord server
